Hi... Everything okay?: I've learned a lot from my parrot family...
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 我從我的鸚鵡家族學到很多事情……

Hi... Everything okay?: But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know.
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 但我很確定，在外面的世界裡還有更多我不知道的東西。

Hi... Everything okay?: When Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 太陽發怒、烈日當頭的時候，待在叢林中就很舒服。

Hi... Everything okay?: Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha...
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 躲在葉子下面，太陽就找不到我們了。我們把他給耍了！哈哈……

Hi... Everything okay?: Be careful in the volcano... the spirits don't like outsiders.
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 在火山裡要小心……精靈不喜歡外來者。

Hi... Everything okay?: Have you met the others like you?
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 你見過像你這樣的人嗎？

Hi... Everything okay?: I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with my own kind...
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 我不怎麼跟他們說話，和我自己的同類待在一起，我感覺更安全……

Hi... Everything okay?: One time... I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away.
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 有一天晚上……我在火山頂端，我看到遠處有光亮。

Hi... Everything okay?: I wonder if there are other bird families out there?
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 我想知道，那裡是不是住著其他的鳥兒家族？

Hi... Everything okay?: I wonder if I could see your home from the top of the volcano?
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 我在想，我能不能在火山頂端望見你的家？

Hi... Everything okay?: You go on... have fun. Let me be sad.
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 你繼續……找樂子吧。讓我傷心就好。

Hi... Everything okay?: When it rains, strange birds visit.
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 下雨的時候，會有陌生的鳥兒來訪。

Hi... Everything okay?: I try to speak to them... but they fly away.
嗨……一切都好嗎？: 我試著跟牠們說話……但牠們飛走了。

Hi... Everything okay?: I guess they don't want to be friends...
